title: Revert hero background to the previous background artwork

requirements.text: Revert the public site hero section background image to the exact background artwork that was used immediately before the current image (/assets/generated/anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png). Update the hero so it no longer uses the current background image.

quotes: no I want the other background the one u had before this one

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section (frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx) no longer references /assets/generated/anime-hero-bg-moon-waterfall-volcano-sun.dim_1920x1080.png as its background image.
When loading the site, the visible hero background matches the previously-used background artwork (the one used before the most recent background change).
No other sections (About, Characters, Worldbuilding, Episodes, Contact, Admin, Footer) have visual or functional regressions.

requirements.text: If the previously-used hero background image file is not present in the repository under frontend/public/assets (or frontend/public/assets/generated), restore it (re-add the prior asset) and ensure it is served as a static frontend asset.

quotes: do u remember the background before this new one?
no I want the other background the one u had before this one

acceptanceCriteria: The previously-used background image file exists in the frontend static assets and loads without 404s in the browser network tab.
The Hero section uses the restored prior background asset path.

constraints: Do not change any backend canister logic; this request is limited to the site background/asset selection.
Do not edit files in frontend/immutablePaths (compose using existing components/hooks instead).
nonGoals: Do not create a new background design or change the art direction; the goal is to restore the exact previously-used background.
Do not add a UI toggle/setting to switch backgrounds unless explicitly requested.
